main event: Two yellow discs were observed rapidly descending to the ground southeast of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania in 1950.
interesting points: The discs appeared circular and were observed to descend with an increasing angular elevation.
The discs were first seen to the south and disappeared to the west.
The witness could provide many details about the sighting but could not remember the exact date.
Without the date, the report could not be correlated with other reports to determine possible causes.
The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes.
